rag_description: ApeRAG is a production-ready RAG platform that combines graph, vector, and full-text search for hybrid retrieval, knowledge management, and enterprise AI applications.

feedback.title: Tell Us What You Think
feedback.choose_a_category: Please choose a category for your feedback below.

Harmful.title: Harmful
Harmful.description: Promotes dangerous, violent, or discriminatory acts.

Unsafe.title: Unsafe
Unsafe.description: Contains risky or physically dangerous information.

Unhelpful.title: Unhelpful
Unhelpful.description: Irrelevant, poorly explained, or fails to address the query.

Other.title: Other
Other.description: Any issue not covered by the categories above.

feedback.share_your_feedback_placeholder: Please provide your feedback so we can continue to enhance your experience.
